title: WTB: Nicely centered, crease-free PSA/SGC 4’s and 5’s

posts.post_title: WTB: Nicely centered, crease-free PSA/SGC 4’s and 5’s
posts.post_content:
Like the title says, I’m looking for nicely centered (front and back), crease-free examples of any player in PSA or SGC 4 and 5 grades. 

Please PM me with what you may have and scans, if possible.

Thanks,
Ryan
